e: ￹`Ma~`samisi~`misi~ `ko~ `demak~ `nira~.￺He didn't act quite right / his acts were not fitting for the occasion￻他的作法不完好，只差一點點，他做的不完善
￹`Ma~`samisi~ `ko~ `pi~`latang~ `nira~.￺He didn't measure out quite the right amount.￻他測量的不完全正確
d.f: ￹￺off just a little from being right in size or becoming to the situation * not quite right￻捉襟見肘，只差一點，不完全
